description.en: JB PROTOCOL is a decentralized finance hub that plans to connect all the primary DeFi use-cases within one simple ecosystem on Binance Smart Chain. Audited Since day 0 From Solidity Finance and also Certik Audit and Certik Shield are on the way; avoiding the expensive fees, confusing interfaces, and centralized decision-making of many current platforms. So with these goals in mind, we've built a protocol with some unique features we believe will amplify the power of wealth accumulation for our users.
